title: Went 7 wins out of 10 and got put in the lowest tier of the lowest grade
body:
So I played my provisionals i just recently come back into league after a while and I managed to get 7 wins out of the 10
I then get place in bronze V
Is there something im missing here?
Tbh I am really salty about this

replies.body: Because you were in Bronze 5 in season 4. Provisionals are a way for the system to make sure you are still at the correct MMR not a reset. Your mmr from previous seasons carries over.
